channel.title: CVE Feed for The Biosig Project -- libbiosig
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Biosig Project -- libbiosig

item.title: CVE-2024-21795|2024-02-20T18:00:09.875Z -- the%20biosig%20project -- libbiosig
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the .egi parsing functionality of The Biosig Project libbiosig 2.5.0 and Master Branch (ab0ee111). A specially crafted .egi file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
